basic.description: A study of foundation design methods including stress distribution, slope stability, lateral earth pressure, retaining walls, braced walls, anchors, ultimate bearing capacity, foundation design, and piles. (0/0/0/12/36)~ COURSE DELETED IN 2008/09 ~
basic.subject: CIVL
basic.title: Geotechnical Design

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of CIVL340 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
